data.title: Private Schools in Horizon West, FL
data.meta_description: Explore 2024 school ratings and statistics for private schools in Horizon West. Compare the best private schools near you.
data.text:
#18 Best Private High Schools in Florida .

Windermere Preparatory School

Blue checkmark.

Private School ,

WINDERMERE, FL ,

PK, K-12 ,

169 Niche users give it an average review of 4.3 stars.

Featured Review: Parent says My children graduated from Windermere Prep and were well prepared for college. They have both experienced success at college due to the preparation and education they received at Windermere Prep. The... While neither of my children were high-level athletes, they participated in the athletic program and the experience was excellent. They learned how to work with others to achieve a common goal, to... Overall, we were very pleased with Windermere Prep and would highly recommend it! We are proud that our children are Lakers! .
